Title: Four -chimneys- DRG: the NATO instructor -didn't smoke- what happened. BZVP in Britain
Description: However, the main principles of actions of subversive and reconnaissance groups and basic skills should be possessed by all fighters. Therefore, during basic military training, close attention is also paid to this component. The correspondent of ArmiyaInform told about how Ukrainian mobilized people are taught to set up ambushes during the BZVP training within the borders of the Interflex multinational training mission on the territory of Great Britain. Today, our unit is a sabotage and reconnaissance group in the enemy's near rear or -gray zone- between our and the enemy's positions. The combat mission of the DRG is to ambush an enemy vehicle. According to intelligence data, she should travel along a known route at a certain time. Quietly Came, Quietly Gone is only half of us. According to the conditions of the task, we really have to come quietly, stealthily and quickly, but then make a good noise by destroying the enemy target. After that, you should just as quickly and silently dissolve in the forest and leave without loss to the pre-determined assembly point. We are practicing the task for the fourth or fifth time already - I have already lost my mind. It is already dusk in the forest, it will soon be evening and it will be time to leave for the base. By the end of the fourth day of the field trip with continuous intensity from 5 in the morning to 10 in the evening, I had practically no strength left - I am holding on to moral and willpower. And I'm not alone. After another workout, which was again somewhat improved compared to the previous one, we all hoped that this was the last exit and that we would finally be given some rest before leaving for the base. However, the instructor has other plans - the transport is due to arrive in an hour and a half, so we will have plenty of time to polish our skills one more time. This time, we advance to the road where the enemy SUV should pass. In a line-out division, I get a position on the extreme left flank. I was moved here from another position closer to the center of the right wing, where I already knew every tree, bush, hole and hump. On the edge of the left flank, everything is unknown, so you will have to act as if for the first time - just like in real combat conditions. This is one of the important elements of training - we are constantly changing places in the group during the exercises. This allows you to acquire the necessary skills to act in different positions. We quickly prepare - we fill stores, check and repair equipment, some update the damaged in the previous release of camouflage. The instructor gives smoke grenades to four of us - two on the extreme flanks and two in the center. One of them goes to me. I examine the ammunition, I remember the procedure for bringing the check into combat readiness. At a brief meeting, we receive introductions - the identification of an enemy vehicle and the probable time and route of its movement. We determine the order of advance, the moment of opening fire on the target for the task of destroying the enemy's vehicle, and the order of actions when withdrawing. Choose your current location as the gathering point after completing the mission. The DRG commander and the unit commander this time are one and the same fighter. Despite the mandatory rotation, when everyone in the group becomes the commander in turn, it is he who commands most often and we are happy to accept it. It was not by chance that he was appointed to head the department - out of all of us, he is the best fit for this role. During quieter training exercises, when everyone is fresh and energetic, he demands that he be traded for other fighters so that everyone can try themselves in the role of commander. However, this is a final assessment session to show what we have learned. Besides, everyone is dead tired, so he will be in command himself. We are moving forward. We have to get to the edge of the forest quickly, silently and inconspicuously. Despite the first faint twilight, it is not an easy task - you have to crawl through a thicket of nettles. Those who fall into areas of a prickly blackberry-like shrub fare the worst. However, we get to the firing line in time and send a signal of readiness from the edges to the center, where the commander is. I see two brothers on the right who pick up and transmit my signal from the flank to the center. In the forest, it is a lot of luck to see not only the nearest neighbor, but also the second one behind him. Our chosen positions combine protection with camouflage. How to achieve this, we were taught in several previous classes. It is not easy in the forest, but the instructors are generally satisfied with the result - each of us found a good shelter. The distance between fighters within 12-15 meters is also quite acceptable. Now we have to wait. Being able to do this is also an important element of preparation. At this time, we should rest, but not relax our vigilance in order to instantly react to any change in the situation. At the end of the fourth grueling day, this is especially difficult to do, but we hang on. Visibility is deteriorating. I have a particularly hard time with this with two pairs of glasses, tactical on top of medical. However, the car with the fog lights on is impossible not to notice - it appears from where, where it is expected. The SUV drives slowly, enters a turn cautiously, as if a predatory animal is sneaking along a forest path. As soon as the car of the conditional enemy turns, we make the first aggressive salvo. The forest is undermined by the sounds of mass firing. 5-7 quick shots from eight fighters at close range are capable of dealing critical damage to an unarmored target. Punctured wheels, broken glass, a body riddled with dozens of bullets - and the car is out of order. The SUV stops and activates the emergency horn. This means that the mission is complete - the enemy transport is destroyed. In real life, it would most likely explode and catch fire, because there were more than enough hits in the area of ​​​​the tank, when after the first 50-60 shots we made about the same amount, but slower and more aimed. Now our task is to withdraw without loss to a pre-determined assembly point. Keeping quiet no longer makes sense, because after the massive fire from the forest thicket, the enemy definitely knows about our presence. So now we can not only give visual signs to the neighbor, but also, if necessary, echo with him. However, it is inconvenient to shout from more than 20 meters away to my brother, with whom we have to throw smoke grenades at the same time. So we communicate with signs. I see that he communicates not only with me, but also with his neighbors on the right, coordinating the moment of the throw with them as well. Our -chimneys- fly out and start smoking at the same time as two more on the right flank. If there was any time gap between the throws, it was only a fraction of a second. We wait until the grenades work at full power and begin to leave after the dense smoke envelops the entire forest edge. At the assembly point, the main instructor for this class is already waiting for us, who at the same time is also the main supervisor of our platoon. -I don't know Ukrainian and I didn't understand how you managed to establish communication so masterfully, but the simultaneous first volley and the throwing of smoke grenades are impressive - you did it perfectly,- he says. The instructor notes that this level of communication is a very important achievement and we must do the same on the battlefield when we return to Ukraine. -Do the same- is the highest praise from him, because he usually talks about what, where, and how exactly we need to improve. Exhausted but satisfied, we set off for camp. Before the arrival of the buses, it is still necessary to check the equipment and move all the things. But these, with the exception of cleaning weapons and personal matters, are the last tasks for today. Tomorrow we are promised a day off - there is also a day off within the borders of the Interflex multinational training mission on the territory of Great Britain. True, they take place -according to the scheduled schedule of the weekend-, but that is a completely different story.

Title: Winged by the sea: an attack drone that accelerates on water up to 70 km per hour was presented in P...
Description: As said the developers of this device from PMG, a long-range unmanned system concept that they produced, has advantages over marine analogues due to its built-in autonomy program, low energy consumption, high speed, the ability to move over waves, an inconspicuous water trail that a watercraft leaves behind, as well as low thermal and acoustic signatures, ArmyInform reports. In turn, the authors of site mil.in.ua who visited the Polish Military exhibition stand Group, deployed within the MSPO 2024 defense industry exhibition in Kielce, learned that this drone can carry a 50-kilogram warhead. The design of ReconSea (the name of which can be translated from English as -Sea Scout-) uses the technology of -underwater wings-, which is exotic for the niche of profile drones, represented by three hydrodynamic surfaces directed downwards and a motor submerged under water. At the same time, PMG said that the performance of their device is affected by its high water resistance. The use of a foil design, in which the drone glides over the water like hydrofoils, provides greater independence from weather conditions, but also reduces the detection of a barrage drone due to its quiet movement and minimal footprint left on the water. This, in turn, makes it difficult for enemy units to detect and detonate the drone, which may want to immobilize it. The downward hydrodynamic surfaces of the wings allow the drone to rise to a height of 50 to 80 centimeters above the water at high speeds. This technology reduces water resistance, which contributes to the development of a maximum speed of up to 70 km/h, while ensuring stability and controllability even in the presence of significant turbulence at sea. The drone is equipped with a 9 kW electric motor that provides a range of up to 100 km at cruising speed, making it ideal for extended operations on the water. ReconSea can work both in stand-alone and manual mode. In the autonomous mode, the control is carried out due to the inertial navigation system with the possibility of satellite correction, which allows the drone to independently perform complex maneuvers and avoid obstacles. In manual mode, operators can control the drone via a fiber-optic cable, providing a high level of precision and agility during missions. Polish Military Group is developing its own ecosystem for integrating drones into a single coordinated network. This will allow in the future to create swarms of drones that work in synchronous mode to perform joint combat missions. Such coordination will open up new opportunities for the application of ReconSea in tactical and strategic military operations. Company representatives said that the sample presented at the exhibition is only a prototype that is undergoing research tests. They plan to complete the tests in a few months, presenting a refined model.

Title: In the swamps, they cry about soldiers without kidneys: lies about -black transplantology-
Description: Of course, this is just a lie. It is part of a multi-year campaign called -black transplantology-, which Moscow has been conducting since 2014. For example, in August, the same pro-Kremlin media, citing the same so-called Mykolaiv underground, spread lies about mysterious -black transplant specialists- who arrived from the West and drive mysterious -foreign medical vehicles- in the Sumy region. And in September - about the fact that allegedly Ukrainian children with disabilities are illegally exported to the countries of the European Union to be sold for organs. At one time, the Center for countering disinformation at the NSDC made a large analytical study on this topic, where he described in detail more than 13 thousand (!) similar Russian throws from 2014. The -black transplant- campaign is one of the most savage and beloved -in the swamps.- They invented underground clinics, selling organs in exchange for tanks, and satanic networks of kindergartens - a lot of nonsense that could not be born in the heads of adequate people. And the purpose of such fakes is quite simple: to discredit the Ukrainian military and political leadership and to create a negative image of Ukraine on the international arena. Fake artists try to primitively play on emotions, causing negativity towards everything related to Ukraine.

Title: Mobilization and contract: how long does the employment process for the Armed Forces take
Description: Oleksiy Bezhevets, the Commissioner of the Ministry of Defense for recruiting issues, told about this. According to him, there is currently a unique situation where a person can voluntarily join the army both on the mobilization track and through the contractual form of service, which is a priority. -Well, in terms of mobilization, of course, it's faster. Fewer requirements, simpler process. This can literally take days. The main thing is to undergo a medical examination so that you are recognized as fit for military service,- he said. Oleksiy Bezhevets said that according to the contract, the execution is taking longer, because more documents need to be collected. -There are more requirements, including a more meticulous medical examination,- he noted. We will remind, about 4 thousand vacancies are in the Defense Forces as of the beginning of September 2024. The Ministry of Defense named the the most popular professions among recruiters As reported by ArmyInform, in Kyiv opened already the second recruiting center.

Title: Three occupiers were killed, ten were wounded: how our fighters worked in the Vovchan direction
Description: They released a video of combat work on their channel. -The most delicious target, which was eliminated by the UAV reconnaissance and strike group, was a truck of the Ural type, which was moving near Vovchansk,- the defenders noted. They also inflicted fire damage on strongholds with enemy personnel. -The confirmed losses of the Russian invaders are three killed, ten wounded,- the message reads. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how the fire groups of defenders of the Ukrainian sky from the -Hart- brigade of the State Border Service destroyed four enemy drones in the Vovchan direction in the north of the Kharkiv region.

Title: Ukraine will receive about €600 million of investments in the defense industry
Description: He informs about this on September 29 in social networks. -Today we took an important step in strengthening Ukraine's defense capabilities. This will help attract almost 600 million euros of investment into our defense industry,- he said. According to him, this is a direct contribution to the development of Ukrainian attack UAVs, missiles and anti-tank systems. Denmark allocates 175 million euros, and another 400 million will be attracted from the excess profits of frozen Russian assets. This cooperation is already bearing results - 18 -Bohdan- self-propelled guns, produced with the financial support of Denmark, have entered the ranks of the Armed Forces. -We are open to new models of cooperation with other European countries. Our goal is a strong defense industry that will ensure victory on the battlefield and the restoration of Ukraine's territorial integrity. We are deeply grateful to our partners for their unwavering support!- Rustem Umyerov noted. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Lithuania informed about the transfer to Ukraine of a new batchof military aid.

Title: Roads of death for Russians: in the Pokrovsky direction, our fighters are exterminating the occupier...
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. -Logistics Rusoriz in the Pokrovsky direction continues. -Traditional targets were destroyed: Buhanka, UAZ Hunter, Kamaz and a couple of other trucks,- the message reads. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how Muramasa fighters of the 109th separate brigade of the Terrodefense Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine destroyed a tank, a -Grad- anti-aircraft gun and a bunch of enemy vehicles.

Title: They put together a group: the Defense Forces identified the main component of the victory in the ba...
Description: Ukrainian defenders repelled this massive enemy armored assault, inflicting painful losses on the enemy - during the battle, the soldiers of the units of the Defense Forces destroyed and damaged 40 units of the enemy's military equipment. The very next day in the network the first video of the repulse of the Russian assault has appeared, shared by the battalion of shock air defense systems -Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the head of the Russian army Ivan Sirk. Corresponding video coming soon published also by the Command of Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In addition to the Achilles drones, paratroopers of the 77th Separate Airmobile Brigade of the Dnieper Brigade, Guardsmen of the 1st Presidential Brigade of Operational Assignment named after Hetman Petro Doroshenko -Storm- of the National Guard of Ukraine, and fighters of the 43rd Separate Mechanized Brigade took part in the destruction of the enemy's shock armored fist. A little later the -Achilles- battalion published another video showing a series of battle episodes, that were not included in previous videos. -In the area of ​​Pišchany, the enemy resorted to a mechanized assault with the involvement of more than 50 units of heavy equipment. This was the largest offensive that the unit had to repulse, which only emphasizes the priority of the enemy's goal - the exit to the Oskil River,- the battalion commented on the video. - I must say frankly, I am impressed by the Defense Forces - from the tasking of the senior commander to the communication between the brigades that keep the tone. And also by the joint execution of combat tasks - when one detected, the second escorted, the third struck. The joint fire effect of artillery, anti-tank weapons and, of course, unmanned systems - those that help us identify the enemy and inflict fire damage on him, said the military. The commander of drones expressed his admiration for the coordinated interaction of various units of the Defense Forces. -This was the collective work of the best units,- Oles Malyarevich, deputy commander of the Achilles air defense missile defense battalion of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the basket chieftain Ivan Sirka, emphasized on the broadcast of the marathon -Suspilne Novosti-. Impeccable communication between the units and their coordinated interaction made it possible to jointly repulse a massive enemy assault with the use of a significant amount of armored vehicles. — First, we have become much better at interacting with each other. Second, tasks began to be defined more precisely, taking into account all the tricks that the enemy uses against us. And the third is the constant support of every Ukrainian, everyone who supports the Defense Forces of Ukraine, everyone who donates, stressed the commander of the -Achilles- battalion Yuriy Fedorenko. The military man expressed his conviction that it is the unity and the daily collective work of the entire Ukrainian society that will help to achieve victory. Earlier, ArmyInform told how Russian commanders condemned their soldiers to a senseless death at the Vovchansky Zavod.

Title: The last trip of the occupiers: drones eliminate enemy transport
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. -Destruction of the Russian -loaf-, which performed logistical tasks in the Kharkiv direction. Effective work of FPV drone pilots of the 2nd separate detachment of the OMEGA TSP,- the military noted. Earlier, ArmiyaInform showed how the Russians tried to hide a lightly armored communication vehicle, which also served as a repeater, in the middle of the burned, rusty skeletons of previously burned equipment. However, the cunning of the enemy did not help.

Title: The occupiers carry out most of the attacks in the Kurakhiv direction
Description: This is reported in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 16:00 29 September. Today, about 20 settlements in Chernihiv, Sumy, and Kharkiv regions were hit by artillery and mortar shelling. In addition, the Russians carried out airstrikes with anti-aircraft missiles on Kucherivka, Shalygyny, Obody, Esman, Studenko, and Revyakin. In the Kharkiv direction there was one combat. The enemy stormed the defensive lines of our units near Vovchansk. The invaders also carried out two airstrikes on Vovchansk and Muravskyi. In the Kupyan direction since the beginning of the day, six battles have been fought. The enemy carried out offensive actions near Vyshnevoi, Kucherivka, Kruglyakivka and Lozova. Currently, two attacks by the occupiers continue. On the Lyman direction there were seven combat clashes. The enemy stormed near Makiivka, Zarychny, Bilogorivka and Nevsky, where the battle is currently ongoing. In addition, the invaders launched six NARs in the Novoyehorivka district. Four skirmishes took place in the Kramatorsk direction. Russian troops tried to storm our positions near Chasovoy Yar and Belaya Gora, where one attack is still ongoing. In addition, the invaders launched 18 anti-aircraft missiles along Chasovoy Yar. In the Toretsk direction the Russians tried to dislodge our units from their positions near Shcherbinivka, Toretsk and Nelipivka. Half of the engagements have been completed, three are ongoing. Also, the aggressor's aircraft dropped anti-aircraft missiles near Katerynivka and Toretsk, and also launched 24 NARs at Druzhba. In the Pokrovsky direction, the enemy carried out 13 assaults in the areas of Vozdvizhenka, Myrolyubivka, Novotoretske, Mykolaivka, Lysivka and Selidove settlements. Defense forces of Ukraine restrained the onslaught of Russian troops and repelled 11 attacks, two battles are ongoing. In the Kurakhiv direction, the invaders attacked 17 times near Tsukuryny, Alexandropol, Georgiyivka, Bogoyavlenka, Katerynivka, and Kostyantynivka. Thirteen attempts to advance were repelled by Ukrainian fighters, four are still ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy stormed our positions near Vugledar, Bogoyavlenka, Katerynivka and Elizavetivka 11 times. Nine battles completed, two still ongoing. In addition, having involved aviation, the invaders hit the districts of Rivnopil, Novodarivka and Zolota Niva with NARs. There were three skirmishes in the Orihiv direction. The enemy carried out offensive actions in the Novodanilivka district. The enemy also launched three airstrikes on Zaporozhye and Malia Tokmachka. In other areas, the operational situation has not changed significantly. We will remind, last day of loss Russian invaders numbered 1170 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed nine tanks, 38 armored combat vehicles, 62 artillery systems, anti-aircraft missiles, an air defense vehicle, 93 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 84 cars and six units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine released information about the destruction of the R...
Description: informs about this on September 29, the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to available information, on the eve of the strike, an echelon with Iranian missiles arrived at the arsenal. -The military facility had dense cover by means of EW and anti-aircraft defense, however, our units successfully completed their combat mission. There is a fire and detonation of ammunition on the territory of the arsenal,- the report said. The operation was carried out by the Unmanned Systems Forces in cooperation with units of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, and the Security Service of Ukraine. -The defense forces continue to undermine the military potential of the enemy,- the General Staff of the Armed Forces assured.

Title: The children of Melitopol are being prepared for war: the occupiers are implementing Kremlin militar...
Description: About informs Center of National Resistance. In particular, Oleksandr Ostapenko, the head of the regional terrorist association -Svo-, together with local collaborators, is creating specialized classes-barracks for high school students on the basis of local schools. The occupiers are doing everything to turn our children into a future mobilization reserve, preparing them for service in the Russian army. Through such -educational- measures, the Russian authorities are trying to create a new generation loyal to the occupiers and ready to participate in wars for the interests of the Kremlin. The occupation authorities of the Kremlin plan to double the number of students in schools with military training by the end of this school year. It will take place primarily on the basis of the Nakhimov school in Mariupol. As reported by ArmyInform, in the educational institutions of the so-called -LNR- -veresnyata-zapolonyly-luganshhynu/->hastily dedicates first-graders to spring eagles. After all, according to the order of the Kremlin, it is necessary to have time by the end of September.

Title: The MOU said how many people use recruiting centers
Description: Oleksiy Bezhevets, the Commissioner of the Ministry of Defense for recruiting issues, told about this. -A year ago, you and I didn't talk about recruiting at all. What is it? How can one voluntarily choose a position and a part? Few understood this,- he noted. According to him, today thousands of people use the algorithm and mechanism of recruiting centers. -On average, 6.5 thousand per month. Today, even more, these indicators are growing. That is, our main achievement is that this process began to scale - voluntary joining the Defense Forces, and with the selection of both a unit and a position in this unit,- noted Oleksiy Bezhevets. We will remind, about 4 thousand vacancies are in the Defense Forces as of the beginning of September 2024. The Ministry of Defense named the the most popular professions among recruiters As reported by ArmyInform, in Kyiv opened already the second recruiting center.

Title: The President honored the memory of more than 100,000 victims of shootings in Babyny Yar
Description: informs about this Office of the President of Ukraine. Head of the Office of the President Andriy Yermak, Minister of Culture and Strategic Communications Mykola Tochytskyi, rabbis and ambassadors also took part in the ceremony commemorating the executed Jews and other victims of the Nazis, which took place on the territory of the Babyn Yar National Historical and Memorial Reserve. Representatives of Jewish religious organizations read a memorial prayer. Volodymyr Zelensky thanked all those present who honored the memory of the dead. -We cannot forget such terrible times - fascism, Nazism. We have to remind everyone about this. It should be remembered not only in Ukraine, but also to remind everyone outside the borders of our country that such terrible times cannot return again,- he emphasized. The head of state also noted the significant contribution of allied countries and the Jewish people to the victory over Nazism. During the occupation, the Nazis killed about 100,000 people in Babiny Yar - almost the entire Jewish population of the city. Only during September 29-30, 1941, they shot more than 30,000 people in Kyiv: children, women, and the elderly. The road on which local residents were driven to Babiny Yar was called the -Road of Death-. As reported by ArmyInform, today Ukraine commemorates the memory of the victims of the Babi Yar tragedy, one of the most terrible pages of history, which became a symbol of inhuman cruelty.

Title: - Zlyuk Beavers - it is better not to annoy: our drones flew into the Russian trenches
Description: They distributed the video of combat work in the Telegram channel. -Very good destruction of a Russian tank by Zlyuk Bobriv 46 OAeMBr. And a little bit of other combat work. -The soldiers are holding back the constant assaults of the enemy in the Kurakhiv direction, this is to the north of Vugledar,- the report says. Previously, ArmyInform showed six enemy tanks, BMPs and small groups of infantry encounter artillery of the 46th Airborne Brigade of the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: Strike drones and artillery shelling in Kherson region: at least six people were injured
Description: informs Kherson OVA about this. It is noted that a 36-year-old resident of Kherson was hit by a drone. He received a brain injury, a contusion, as well as shrapnel wounds to his arm and leg. Medics promptly took him to the hospital. A 61-year-old woman was also injured as a result of a drone explosion in the Dnipro district of Kherson. She was diagnosed with shrapnel injuries to her face, torso and legs. A 70-year-old man and a 60-year-old woman were injured by artillery shelling in Berislav, who received mine-explosive injuries and contusions. In Kherson, a 56-year-old man came under fire and was hospitalized with shrapnel wounds to his forearm, leg and stomach. Also, in the village of Shiroka Balka, a 45-year-old local resident was injured and received medical assistance after a shrapnel wound to his shoulder and back. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of Russian aggression last day, September 28, in Kherson Oblast, four people died, another ten were injured.

Title: Online recruiting and the opening of new centers: the Ministry of Education and Culture announced it...
Description: Oleksiy Bezhevets, the Commissioner of the Ministry of Defense for recruiting issues, told about this. -First, we have to open more centers by the end of this year. We are in the process of communicating with various cities and are now reaching the finish line. We will open 5-7 centers in the next two months. 39 is already a lot,- he noted. According to him, the formation of the network is being completed, all processes and algorithms are being improved as much as possible in cooperation with the General Staff. -We already have several channels when a person, facing some misunderstandings in the recruitment process, can complain. This algorithm is being built, first of all, through our centers of our recruiters, the hotline of the Ministry of Defense, links on our website,- noted Oleksiy Bezhevets. Also, in the near future, the IOU will launch a contact center so that people can get all the information about recruiting in one place. -Someone wants to consult, some to receive information, some to receive advice, and some to complain. Specially for this, people who are only engaged in this will sit, in order to work out and react as quickly as possible,- Oleksiy Bezhevets explained. In addition, from October, the Ministry of Defense will launch online recruiting as a new stage in the process of recruitment into the Defense Forces. -This is when specially trained recruiters will not just wait for a person to see an advertisement and contact them, but proactively. For example, a person is looking for a job, you are looking for the position of a driver. -Ivan Ivanovich, please look: we have a vacancy for you according to your profile. Maybe you will be interested,- he said. We will remind, about 4 thousand vacancies are in the Defense Forces as of the beginning of September 2024. The Ministry of Defense named the the most popular professions among recruiters As reported by ArmyInform, in Kyiv opened already the second recruiting center.

Title: Shelling of Zaporizhzhia: an 8-year-old girl was added to the numerous wounded
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. As a result of the shelling, nine women, five men and two children were injured - a 17-year-old boy and an 8-year-old girl. Two injured women remain in the hospital. We will remind, in one place, a high-rise building from 1 to 4 floors was destroyed. In the course of liquidation consequences, emergency workers rescued a woman from the rubble. The victim was taken to a medical facility. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of the morning massive enemy air strike on Zaporizhzhia the number of victims increased, two of them were rescued.

Title: the Russian commanders condemned the soldiers to a senseless death at the Vovchansk factory
Description: About said Andrii Chernyak, representative of the Ministry of Internal Affairs and Communications of Ukraine, on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyni- telethon. According to him, the preparation of the mission to liberate the plant took several weeks, and the successful clearing of the plant's buildings by special forces of the Ukrainian military intelligence is important for the further actions of the Security and Defense Forces of the state. -This was necessary in order to simplify the logistics as much as possible, the provision of our forces that are in this region. In the future, this will give the Defense Forces of Ukraine the opportunity to conduct counteroffensive actions and expel the enemy from Ukrainian land,- said the representative of the GUR MOU. He added that the Russians at the plant had suffered serious losses because the leaders of the occupiers effectively condemned their soldiers to a senseless death by violence. -Actually, terrible, wild, strange things happened there from the side of Russian commanders to their subordinates. It is about deliberate murders, it is about terror. This is another example when a Russian soldier does not have any rights and is not considered a person at all,- noted Andriy Chernyak. As reported by ArmyInform, in order to establish logistics in the north of the Kharkiv region, the Russian invaders ekspermentuye-z-ovt/->are trying to use UAVs and robotic platforms suitable for transporting heavy loads.

Title: The Ministry of Defense named the most popular professions in recruiting centers
Description: In the recruiting centers of the Ukrainian army, the positions of UAV operators and maintenance of military equipment and weapons remain the most popular. Oleksiy Bezhevets, the Commissioner of the Ministry of Defense for recruiting issues, told about this. -We monitor these dynamics from week to week. There are various surges in one direction or another. Traditionally, UAV operators, positions related to the maintenance of military equipment, staff positions, and logistics are popular,- he said. Oleksiy Bezhevets noted that the army needs all volunteers who can hold positions related to the maintenance of military equipment and various types of weapons. -These are gunnery positions and these are operators of any military equipment,- he noted. We will remind, about 4 thousand vacancies are in the Defense Forces as of the beginning of September 2024. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kyiv opened already the second recruiting center.

Title: The enemy attacked Odesa with drones: destruction in two districts of the region

In the Rozdilnya district, several drones fell into an open area without catching fire. Fortunately, there are no dead or injured. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of Russian aggression last day, September 28, in Kherson Oblast, four people died, another ten were injured.

Title: This week, the Russian army used almost 900 aerial bombs, more than 300 -shaheed- and more than 40 m...
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. He noted that ordinary residential buildings were damaged, in one of them the entrance was destroyed. There is also damage to urban infrastructure, railways. A total of 13 people were injured, two were rescued from the rubble. -I thank all the services that responded quickly and provided the necessary assistance to people. Debris clearance is still ongoing,- the head of state said. In total, in just one week, the Russian army used almost 900 aerial bombs, more than 300 -shaheed- and more than 40 missiles. -This Russian terror knows no pauses, and it can be stopped only by the unity of the world — unity in supporting Ukraine and unity in pressuring Russia for war,- the President summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of the morning massive enemy air strike on Zaporizhzhia the number of victims increased, two of them were rescued.

Title: The occupiers fall on the move - they are met by a shower of fire from the paratroopers' small arms
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. -The occupiers are trying to break through our defenses either with frontal attacks, or they are trying to infiltrate through it in small groups,- defenders of Ukraine say. They assure that their scouts are ready for any enemy action. -The enemy is always in the field of vision of UAV pilots, kamikaze drones are ready to take off, and paratroopers in trenches meet the invaders with a barrage of fire from small arms,- ​​the military notes. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 71st Yegeri Brigade of the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine with the help of drones -rosiyan/->caused significant losses to the Russians.

Title: Rustem Umyerov on Babyn Yar: The memory of the victims should become a lesson for the world
Description: The Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov reminded about the mass shootings that took place in September 1941, when the Nazis exterminated more than 33,000 people in two days. Babyn Yar became a necropolis for about 100 thousand souls - Jews, Ukrainians, Roma, prisoners of war and representatives of other nationalities. Their -guilt- was only that they did not conform to the ideology of a regime based on hatred and violence. The Minister of Defense emphasized that today Putin's Russia represents a new totalitarian regime, and the world must unite to protect humanity in order to prevent the recurrence of similar tragedies.

Title: Losses of the Russian army in a week: 9,290 invaders and more than 2,000 units of weapons and equipm...
Description: This was reported by the commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavliuk. Weapons/military equipment of Russian troops suffered significant losses: In addition, our defenders destroyed at least 15 enemy missiles and 558 OTR UAVs. As reported by ArmyInform, The Armed Forces summed up the results of September: Oleksandr Syrsky defined new priorities and strategic directions for October.

Title: Robotic platforms, UAVs and mining: in Kharkiv Oblast, the enemy is experimenting with UAVs
Description: Detailed information about the situation and enemy losses in the Kharkiv direction was informed in Kharkiv OTU. In the area of ​​the Hlyboke settlement, with the aim of strengthening the positions of the 79th Motorized Rifle Regiment of the 18th Motorized Rifle Division, the enemy moved the personnel of the -Storm- unit of the 11th Tank Regiment of the 18th Motorized Rifle Division. Carried out remote replenishment of ammunition with the help of a UAV. The enemy's use of robotic platforms to perform logistics tasks was noted. In the Lukyantsiv region, the enemy carried out remote mining of the area with PFM-1 -Peliustka- and POM-2 mines. In Vovchansk, the enemy deployed personnel to the positions of the 82nd Motorized Rifle Regiment of the 69th Motorized Rifle Division of the 6th Army in order to replenish current losses. He focused the main efforts on conducting aerial reconnaissance with further fire damage to units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. Near the settlement of Tikhe, the enemy made an attempt to carry out an assault by forces to a motorized rifle unit without the support of equipment. Had no success, retreated. 1 enemy-initiated combat engagement occurred during the past 24 hours. the Russian occupiers also carried out 5 airstrikes using 11 anti-aircraft missiles and 50 kamikaze drone strikes. They carried out 289 shelling of the positions of defenders of Ukraine. The defense forces respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. The enemy's losses over the past day amounted to 52 creatures, of which 25 were irreversible, 37 were sanitary. Also the enemy lost destroyed and damaged 80 units of weapons and military equipment, in particular: In addition , in the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces destroyed 45 shelters for personnel. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how the occupiers are burned near Vovchansk right on the's positions.

Title: Numerous victims of Russian attacks in the Kherson region: a high-rise building and 30 buildings wer...
Description: informs the head of the Kherson State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin about this. Antonivka, Beryslav, Veletenske, Havrylivka, Dudchany, Prydniprovske, Shiroka Balka, Novodmytrivka came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. Stanislav, Romashkove, Trifonivka, Kizomys, Yasna Polyana, Odradokamyanka, Sadov, Shlyakhove, Mykhailivka, Novovorontsovka, Tomarine, Nova Kamianka, Sablukivka and the city of Kherson were also under attack. In addition, the Russian military targeted a cultural institution. The occupiers also attacked the residential quarters of the populated areas of the region, including a high-rise building and 30 private houses. An economic building, a bus and private cars were also damaged. As reported by ArmiyaInform, last day the enemy struck another blow in the Mykolaiv district. In particular, the Kutsurub community was attacked by FPV drones .

Title: The rescue operation ended in Zaporizhzhia: the number of victims increased
Description: informs about this, Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. Eleven people - two men and nine women - the oldest of whom is 83 years old, turned to the doctors. Three people are now in the hospital, eight refused hospitalization. In total, the Russians dropped 13 aerial bombs on Zaporozhye. At present, the emergency and rescue operations have been completed. Rescuers extinguished the fire of 9 cars and 5 garages on a total area of ​​300 square meters. Elsewhere, one one-story residential building was partially destroyed and another 10 were damaged. Emergency workers extinguished the gas pipeline fire. Regarding the consequences and the number of damaged private houses, information is being clarified. We will remind, in one place, a high-rise building from 1 to 4 floors was destroyed. In the course of liquidation consequences, emergency workers rescued a woman from the rubble. The victim was taken to a medical facility. As reported by ArmyInform, today, September 29, the enemy launched the most massive air strikes on the city of Zaporozhye. Previously, as a result of the events, 4 people were injured.

Title: The Armed Forces summed up the results of September: Oleksandr Syrsky determined new priorities and ...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The event, led by the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, was held using a closed video conference network with the participation of commanders of types, separate branches, troop groups and heads of military administration. At the meeting, a number of topical issues were discussed, including: mobilization aspects, strengthening the effectiveness of managing the actions of troops, improving the quality of training of our soldiers, the need for operational generalization and taking into account combat experience, and increasing the effectiveness of enemy fire damage. Identified officials of the General Staff reported on the analysis of the implementation of operational tasks by areas of activity, problematic issues and ways to solve them. The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine has defined key tasks and priorities for the next month. As reported by ArmyInform, 165 combat clashes were recorded during the past 24 hours. More than a quarter of them fall on the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: The Russians struck Kharkiv Oblast with drones and FPV drones: 4 people died, 10 were injured
Description: informed Oleg Synegubov, chief of the Kharkiv OVA, about the consequences of enemy shelling of the region by the military of the army of the Russian Federation during the past day . In Kozachya Lopan, a car was damaged as a result of enemy fire by an FPV drone. A 61-year-old man died. Three women aged 62, 61 and 55 were injured. Photos of the consequences of the shelling were made public by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. In Slatino, a modular building, farm buildings, and an educational institution were damaged as a result of the KAB shelling. 7 people aged between 25 and 71 were injured. Three men died. Photos of the destruction caused by the Russian shelling published by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office and disclosed to the Main Department of the National Emergency Service of Ukraine in the Kharkiv region. The State Emergency Service reported that as a result of the shelling, a non-residential building, a modular house, several outbuildings and a car on a total area of ​​140 square meters were destroyed, as well as dry grass in an open space on an area of ​​1 hectare. An educational institution, private houses, and other objects of civil infrastructure were damaged. 2 fire and rescue units of the State Emergency Service, consisting of 2 units of equipment and 11 firefighters, were involved in liquidating the consequences of enemy airstrikes. Also, photos of the consequences of the Russian strikes were distributed at the Main Directorate of the National Police of Ukraine in the Kharkiv region. In Kupyan Oblast, the occupiers attacked the village of Kivsharivka of the Kupyan community, an apartment building was damaged there as a result of enemy shelling. The Russian invaders also shelled the village of Podoli of the Kuril community, where a house was on fire as a result of the shelling. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv Oblast a judge of the Supreme Court was killed as a result of a Russian drone strike in the border village of Kozacha Lopan of the Dergachy community of Kharkiv district.

Title: Russia's air defense is impressive: a Ukrainian drone was shot down by an ammunition depot in the Vo...
Description: This is reported by Army TV. -And again, our traditional heading is explosions in the Russian Federation, where again nothing happened, and everyone shot down everything, and if something is burning somewhere, it's grass,- the agency stated ironically. It is noted that this night in the Volgograd region, Russian air defense, with the help of a warehouse with ammunition, shot down a Ukrainian drone. In addition, the Russian Ministry of Defense complains that they were attacked by 125 drones that night. -The largest number of drones flew over the territory of the Volgograd region - 67 UAVs were allegedly shot down there. In addition, 17 drones are in Belgorod Oblast, 18 drones are in Rostov Oblast, and 17 drones are in Voronezh Oblast,- the report says. As ArmyInform reported, in Kurshchyna the enemy loses potential under the yoke of the Armed Forces's strikes.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi: The scale of evil in Babyny Yar is still hard to fathom
Description: This was stated President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy. In total, during the Nazi occupation, about 100,000 people were killed in Babiny Yar. Virtually the entire Jewish community of Kyiv was destroyed, and even those who tried to save them. Representatives of other nationalities also became victims. Babin Yar is a terrible symbol of the fact that the most terrible crimes occur when the world chooses not to notice, to be silent, to be indifferent, to be not resolute enough to fight back evil. The head of state emphasized that when the eyes of the world are closed, humanity loses. Babyn Yar is a vivid proof of the atrocities that regimes led by leaders who rely on intimidation and violence are capable of. At any time, they are no different. But the reaction of the world must be different. This is what the world had to learn. It is necessary to stand on the guard of humanity, life and justice. According to the President, we must protect ourselves from evil. -Eternal memory to all victims of the Nazis! Eternal condemnation to everyone who is guilty of the murders in Babiny Yar!- — summed up Volodymyr Zelenskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kyiv presented research on history of the Holocaust in Ukraine.

Title: The story of the rescue of four wounded: combat medic Yulian told the details
Description: Under what circumstances can a medic be injured at the front? But what depends on the survival of the injured person during evacuation? Military serviceman Yulian told our correspondent: -I became a doctor in the army, because in civilian life I also practiced medicine. 18 years of experience. Although at first he was an ordinary shooter for a week or two. Then they saw that I was understanding, so they appointed me as a platoon medic. …Once one of the groups of our brigade was on a mission, they were wounded on the way out. There were four servicemen in the group, not all of them could go out on their own. As soon as I heard about it, I immediately said that I would go and get them. According to the data transmitted over the walkie-talkie, the enemy worked hard on that group. We went to the evacuation together. On the spot, they saw that one of our soldiers had broken legs, others were wounded, some in the stomach, some in the chest. I was hurt too… It was in the Robotyny district. We then went to evacuate our fellow man. We were immediately spotted, they began to cover us with a mortar. Then they saw that we are not afraid of them, and they already started working on us with drones. And, unfortunately, one caught up with us. I received a wound in my arm - an artery was hit, and shrapnel entered the liver, intestine, and right leg. First put a tourniquet on the arm. He was on me for 5 minutes, then I put on an Israeli bandage, and then slowly began to loosen the tourniquet. And constantly watched so that the bleeding did not resume. I am currently rehabilitating after my injury. …In general, in military medicine, it always turns out that every minute during assistance is worth its weight in gold. For those medics who are just going to the front, I advise you to pay special attention to analgesia, dressings, and applying a tourniquet. Well, of course, not everything always depends on the doctor, because a lot depends on the evacuation transport. If the driver is experienced, motorable, if he clearly navigates the situation, then this increases the chances of saving the injured person.-

Title: Putin's nuclear blackmail is a bluff, or How the enemy cleverly manipulates terms
Description: He said, a -critical threat- to Russia's sovereignty, even with conventional weapons, would be grounds for a nuclear response. Such statements are obviously heard in the Kremlin, when it is necessary to warm up the electorate, to raise the rating after another failure or crossing of previously declared -red lines- by the Defense Forces of Ukraine. But Putin's nuclear threats are no longer working even in the West, where similar statements no longer cause such a stir as before. In Ukraine, they are generally treated with irony, because Russian propaganda and threats have not worked here for a long time. -Putin's nuclear blackmail is a fear of Ukrainian weapons, which deprives the Russian Federation of strategic weapons depots, harms Putin's ability to continue terror . This is a horror film about fear. Nothing more,- said Lieutenant Andriy Kovalenko, head of the CSDP of the NSDC. Everyone has already perfectly understood how the katsaps cunningly manipulate terms, for example: war is theirs; arrival - debris; explosion - bang; terrorist - foreign specialist. With the help of changing names, they can twist their legislation like a dam they have to. For example, they wrote in their doctrine that a nuclear warhead will fly over all countries that launch UAVs on the territory of the Russian Federation. This caused general euphoria and a wave of -victory -. The next day, the UAV flies to Moscow, hits a high-rise building under the action of EW. The average katsaps hunkered down in anticipation of the promised nuclear attack on the Western aggressor, turned on the televisions, and there some governor says: -a UFO flew over us today.- In other words, there is no reason to use a kernel. Similar threats with a kernel have already burst like soap bubbles many times. When our army sank the Moscow fleet, when it destroyed enemy warehouses and military facilities in the Crimea, when it attacked oil refineries... In the end, when the Armed Forces entered the -originally Russian- Kursk region, all previous repeated threats of nuclear weapons turned out to be the same bubble. It turned out that the dictator is not capable, as he promised, -to use all the means that are at our disposal to protect Russia and our people,- and called everything that is happening there just -large-scale provocation.- So even now, the only thing that the Kremlin's powerful and aging dwarf wants to achieve with his threats is to disrupt Western support for Ukraine. After all, they sound against the background of the discussion about whether the West can allow Ukraine to strike with long-range weapons on the territory of the Russian Federation. Maybe And in the end it will allow.

Title: 40 units of enemy equipment are affected! Continuation of the epic battle in Kharkiv region

On September 26, the ACHILLES air defense missile battalion had 40 units of damaged and destroyed equipment in the Kupyansk direction alone, where every episode was recorded,- the battalion noted. The current video is the second part. The first part can be viewed here. As reported by ArmyInform, the crew of the Achilles air defense missile battalion of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the basket commander Ivan Sirk hit the Russian self-propelled gun 2C5 -Hyacinth-S-.

Title: Evacuation by quad bikes: combat medics told how they save the wounded in Donetsk region
Description: Report spread by the -Return Alive- fund on September 26. The commander of the evacuation group with the call sign Sokil in civilian life was a traumatologist, he was the director of a city hospital in Prykarpattia. He says that during work in the Bakhmut direction, it was necessary, in particular, to first evacuate the military with a quad bike and then transfer them to an evacuation vehicle. -Boys on landings, if possible, take them to where the ATV can still go. Because he doesn't always have the opportunity to drive around – everything is so full of craters from the explosions... We wait for the ATV to bring us the wounded, we pick him up, stabilize him if necessary, and when he is in better condition, we take him to the stabilization point,- says Sokil. The driver of such an evacuation quad bike with the call sign -Mavka- says that the distance from the point where the wounded person is taken to the point of transfer to the evacuation vehicle can be up to 5 kilometers. -We drive in the zone serious fire control of the enemy with mortars, drones, artillery. Then we transfer it to the car, there the intensity of enemy fire is already a little lower, but still there are no guarantees,- says -Mavka-. He recalls that during the evacuation, the wounded from Bakhmut were evacuated by car. There was no need for a quad bike there, because it was an asphalt hard surface. -And here are the fields. Mobility, inconspicuousness, minimal dimensions are required here. Because if the evacuation is going by car, it is a minimum of three people. The machine is large, less maneuverable, it is much easier to beat it with the same ATGM, artillery. And the target, accordingly, is fatter: because it can lead either a lot of BC or a lot of infantry. a quadricycle – you go alone, and the target is no longer so fat,- says Mavka. The difficulty of night evacuation, in the words of the military, is the saturation of the sky with enemy drones. -They see everyone who comes in and who comes out. When you don't get shot at, it's probably a lucky coincidence. Maybe the battery in the drone died or they were cleaning the mortar at that moment. That is, these coincidences give you the opportunity to work in silence. Even a year ago, there were not so many drones, it was possible to work much easier. Now every second is everything. You can't struggle, fall, turn over in the pits. You feel a constant responsibility and burden, because you understand that you can't go anywhere from the field, especially with a wounded person,- Mavka states. Other difficulties of night evacuation include poor visibility or eruptions, from , for example, KABA, 5 meters deep. The price of a quad bike on which you can evacuate is approximately 370,000 hryvnias. How medics of 33 mechanized brigades fight for the lives of soldiers – you can read at this link.

Title: - Threatening - the rhetoric of the Russian Federation about nuclear weapons begins to lose its mean...
Description: This opinion was expressed by the head of the Council of Reservists of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Ivan Tymochko on the air of Suspilnyi on September 28 , answering the presenter's question about how much Ukrainians should be afraid of such statements. -Now Russian rhetoric is beginning to lose its meaning and threatening color after a non-nuclear country (Ukraine) conducted a successful military operation on the territory of the nuclear state of the Russian Federation. I mean Kurshchyna. All theories and analyzes that were previously evaluated (and these were just theories, because after Hiroshima and Nagasaki there were no nuclear strikes on the territory of sovereign countries) were considered as such that a nuclear country would use at least tactical nuclear weapons. But, as we can see, they did not apply it, they did not know at all what to do with it,- commented Ivan Tymochko. He also recalled that the power of warehouse explosions in the Russian Toropts, according to various estimates, was approximately 30 kilotons. -And one tactical nuclear bomb is 10 kilotons. That is, roughly speaking, we will say that two full-fledged tactical nuclear bombs exploded there… And we understand that a nuclear bomb is also accompanied by a radioactive background, contamination of territories. What am I leading to? Such an effect of the impact as the Russians imposed (that, they say, radioactive ash everywhere) did not occur. The power of the explosion does not pose a threat. In addition, there are no such concentrations of armed forces in modern conditions of war, as it was during the Second World War: when brigades, divisions, million-strong armies advanced,- Ivan Tymochko recounted. He stressed that a tactical nuclear strike on a military compound would have -very little effect.- -At the very least, it certainly won't change the course of events in specific directions, but it will cause a flurry of negativity. Apply to the civilian population? We understand that this will be the reaction of all nuclear countries, including China.- Ivan Tymochko reminded that China is one of the opponents of Russia's use of nuclear weapons. As reported by ArmyInform, all the statements of Vladimir Putin and Alexander Lukashenka about nuclear weapons -i-putina-pro-yadernu-zbroyu/->should be considered as a -single network of information campaign-.

Title: - Hit your own! - the Russians hit their own soldiers who were going to surrender
